features: REVIVE DRY, DAMAGED HAIR: TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo hair care for Dry Hair delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness and locks in moisture where your hair needs it most
RESTORE VIBRANCY: This gentle moisturizing shampoo is formulated with vitamin E and biotin to help soften hair without weighing it down
ADVANCED MOISTURIZING SYSTEM: Our moisturizing shampoo delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness where your hair needs it most
SHAMPOO THAT DELIVERS: TRESemmé helps revive dry hair with gentle moisturizers for touchably soft hair with professional-looking shine that lasts for days
MORE THAN HAIR PRODUCTS: TRESemmé is committed to advancing the next generation of female leaders by creating an intentional momentum forward.
PAMPER YOUR HAIR: Treat yourself to TRESemmé Moisture Rich hair products—from a conditioning mask to a detangling spray—to create beautiful styles on the go without the hefty price tag
body.description: When it comes to replenishing moisture to dry locks, use TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo for Dry Hair to restore natural vibrancy for a healthy look and eye-catching shine. TRESemmé wants you to look and feel your best, which is why the TRESemmé Moisture Rich System delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness and locks in moisture where your hair needs it most—every day. Enriched with vitamin E, this gentle shampoo is designed to deliver optimum hydration that targets dryness and seals in moisture. The lightweight formula means you can turn dry, damaged hair into soft, manageable strands with beautiful shine. It’s also safe for colored hair. How to use the Moisture Rich System: Step 1: Coat hair with a liberal amount of TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo. Step 2: Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather. Step 3: Lightly squeeze the shampoo from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. Step 4: Apply an adequate amount of Moisture Rich Conditioner from mid-shaft to ends. Step 5: Run a wide-tooth comb or fingers from roots to ends to detangle and fully coat hair. Leave for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Step 6: Finish with your favorite TRESemmé styling products as desired. Are you looking for a moisturizing shampoo for damaged hair? The clear choice is TRESemmé. Use TRESemmé Shampoo with TRESemmé's salon-quality hair styling products to perfect your look. These professional, salon-quality hair care products are deep conditioning hair products for dry hair without the salon price tag. Hair feeling dull or dry? TRESemmé Moisture Rich Detangling Spray is a conditioning, leave-in detangler that delivers intense nourishment and hydration, giving tresses a beautiful, healthy shine. Or give your hair the deep-rooted moisture it craves. TRESemmé Moisture Rich Deep Conditioning Mask works hard so you don’t have to, delivering intense nourishment that leaves hair looking healthy and happy in just one use. Ever since our origin in salons, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look and feel their best, and that usually starts with a good hair day! TRESemmé is dedicated to creating hair care and styling products that are professional quality and promoting the values that defined our inspirational founder, Edna L. Emme — independence, self-reliance, and, most importantly, the confidence you need to step up and meet the next challenge. We believe in empowering women with quality products so that they can feel strong and confident.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with the right wash and care foundation. TRESemmé Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable*. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. *with continued use.

LUXURIOUS SOFTNESS & SHINE Our Rich Moisture System, with Hyaluronic Plex, nourishes strands, leaving them feeling hydrated, soft and with a healthy/ looking shine. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create any style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA-approved cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil and DMDM Hydantoin. TRESemmé brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022. PROFESSIONAL, SALON QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemmé is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want. So you can do it with style.

TRESemmé Rich Moisture Conditioner, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Conditioner, 28 oz Main Benefit Looking for soft, shiny strands? The TRESemmé Rich Moisture Conditioner, with Hyaluronic Plex, pairs with its shampoo to nourish strands, leaving them feeling hydrated, soft and with a healthy-looking shine. Say hello to 48 hours of frizz control & shine with the TRESemmé Silky Smooth collection. Made with Argan OleoBlend, this shampoo, when paired with its conditioner, intensely moisturizes and tames frizz and flyaways, leaving hair silky, soft & smooth Tame frizz & boost your hair’s shine for 48 hours with the TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Collection. Made with Argan OleoBlend, this conditioner pairs with its shampoo to intensely moisturize, taming frizz and flyaways to leave hair silky, soft and smooth.
TRESemmé-Listed as animal test-free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program,2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is good…when Amazon sent it, they did not pack the shampoo in a plastic bag. It was just thrown in a box….covers to the shampoo bottle got loose…shampoo all over…gooey, sticky…had to clean t up. It was a mess. Shampoo had soaked in the cardboard box..horrible. I called Amazon and asked if they please pack it in a plastic bag, tie the bag and then put in the box when they ship items with liquid in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm really happy with this
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo. It has a great scent, I feel my hair is clean when I use it, and I saved money when comparing prices at the store. Ever since 2020 I have been trying to build a bit of a storage closet with bulk back up items. I like the confidence I have knowing I have a back up when my bottle runs out. I'm stocking 3 bathrooms so I'll likely buy more of this.
